## `StitchImages`

Combines a list of images vertically or horizontally. Returns `true` if image successfully saved.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean StitchImages(string outputImagePath,
                     Orientation direction,
                     string inputImage1,
                     string inputImage2,
                     ...)
```


### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` outputImagePath | Where to save the combined images. | 
|[`Orientation`](#orientation) direction | The direction to combine the images. | 
|`string` inputImage1 | The path of the first image to combine. | 
|`string` inputImage2 | The path of the second image to combine. | 
| ... | A variable list of image paths to combine. |
